attributes.action: Reinstate the 7th Day  (Saturday) as a day of  National Religious Observance which was formerly  abolished  in 1069.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister and Government to pass a law that will make the 7th day of the week (Saturday) a day of National Religious Observance equal to that of Sunday, the 1st day of the week.  Our petition is to reinstate the 7th day Sabbath as a national institution which in time past was observed by all our forefathers in this the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
